title: Fifty-Five Bodies Found At Reform School For Boys In Florida

comments.text:
An even more frightening truth would emerge if these white trash boys would 
stop lying by omission, and tell the full story of what they had done to 
their inmates before they got their asses beat in that little white 
building. The fact is, strong men with leather straps were necessary 
counter influences against their violent attacks on their inmates. Many 
kids in that school got beat senseless and left with scars, stitches, 
bruises and broken bones, one or more perhaps raped and murdered. The staff 
at Marianna did not do that to them. The white trash boys did all that.﻿

comments.author: Matthew Heymann

comments.text:
I read about this a while back, and how there are still survivors around 
from it who are haunted by the memories, there was one kid who they know 
got burned in a clothes dryer etc.  This was pretty much the state of a lot 
of "reform school" or "lunatic asylum" facilities from that time period, 
they just found like 1000 unmarked graves at a Mississippi former hospital 
recently and sadly it's not an uncommon thing.  It's disheartening that not 
much can be done about it either, it's like, where do you trace the blame 
back to?  Some of the people who were in charge are long dead, who knows 
where the others are, and there were probably not very many written records 
(if any) on the punishments used by the staff.  Who put the money into 
keeping these places open, who in society ever thought this was okay?  I 
can't wrap my head around it.  The "Asylum Era" sounds like it was a 
disgusting period for humanity.  I'm guessing whoever was in charge either 
thought it was okay, couldn't afford to do better, or both.﻿

comments.text:
#1) America does not love her children. Proof is in the attitudes and 
legislation aimed at kids.
#2) Good Ol' Boys Network=immunity to prosecution.
#3) Blatant, long term abuse never happens in a vacuum. Some very highly 
placed (from the Governor's Office on down) and powerful politicians have 
been actively aiding, abetting and participating in this malignance. Well 
placed judges, prosecutors, police, many juvenile judicial/law enforcement 
officials and upstanding citizens have given their tacit permission.
#4) Guaranteed is that there are large quantities of cash money being made 
from this situation and distributed to maintain the status quo.
#5) Guaranteed is that each child victim sent to that hellhole was 
carefully vetted on the basis of their isolation in society; as throwaway 
children without responsible allies or family.
#6) Even before the Internet, child molesters have always found each other 
and banded together to create a pool of ever-renewing victims for their 
personal pleasure.
This is hardly a unique situation. I just hope we Americans can muster the 
attention, energy and caring to uncover and address the rest of our child 
abusing institutions and authority figures.﻿

comments.author: badwolf6356

comments.text:
Shit was going on like this all the time even into the fifties and sixties. 
The Indian reservations in Montana from the late 1800s to the mid 1900s 
were robbed of their children basically and sent to our reform schools. 
They were forced to stop speaking their language,beaten and many sexually 
abused by clergy in particular. These schools were more prisons than 
schools. There are many horror stories I have heard first hand from some 
who have attended them. Its crazy shit that no one wants to know epecially 
those involved with the catholic church. Most were closed down by the 60s 
but we as Americans have a very checkered past. Look into eugeneics. That 
is actually admitted to by govt. and no one ever talks about it and it isnt 
taught in schools. Say thank to the Rockefellers and Rothchilds for that 
one. The Rockefellers have many speeches given on the subject where they 
admit to eugenics. So who is really in control? Wake up people these things 
happened and can happen again if given half the chance. Keep giving up your 
constitutional rights and freedoms thinking it gives you more safety and 
see what happens. Rothschilds go back scheming all the way to Napolean and 
were behind stock crash in England in the early 1800s. They support both 
sides of every conflict and always win that way. Read and educate 
yourselves on such things before it is too late﻿

comments.author: John Smith

comments.text:
+OcularPolitics
 You seem to believe cenk has no idea what he's talking about whether it's 
worse or most horrific or whatever the wording you want to use.
the fact is anna made a very clear point that this is not some isolated 
case but is in fact a systemic problem throughout the country in these 
institutions. you could even extend it to mental institutions, institutions 
for the deaf dumb and blind and retarded., elderly and various handicaps.
And I'm sure cenk would whole heatedly agree with me.

What cenk does know is the well known Stanford experiment which emulated 
the power and control these institutions have over their clients, patients, 
prisoners whatever you want to call them.

As far this case is concerned (I'm no expert) but this is about the worst 
case I've ever heard. So pole vaulting over fly shit to determine that cenk 
has no idea what he's talking about is a bit  ridiculous .
comments.author: writerconsidered

comments.text:
I'll freely admit to emphasizing a word in a sentence I could have typed 
differently to be a bit more accurate, but to focus on that is detracting 
from the point that there are hideously worse stories that TYT seems to be 
simply unaware of, all over the world and in the US as well. That's really 
all I was saying in any event.
comments.author: OcularPolitics

comments.text:

It's not whining about the exact wording when you emphasized a word that he 
didn't say, in order to change what he said and then complain about what 
you made up.  Cenk said it's "this is actually one of the most disturbing 
stories I have ever read", and your entire argument is that he said it was 
the very worst story he'd ever heard.  It's not what he said.  And pointing 
that out is not trolling and whining over exact wording, the exact wording 
that you are complaining about is the wording that you made up.

comments.author: LukaBlight69

comments.text:
+Rustedblade "Another lowly little Sycophant who lacks the Critical 
Thinking Skills and Intellectual Fortitude to Structure his own original 
thoughts!"

You summed yourself up nicely. I don't have a hard time believing that you 
would jump to the outrageous conclusion that those responsible for 
the mismanagement of this reform school must have been Democrats or 
Atheists. What are your sources?

Furthermore, your attack on Trevor Colby is equally ridiculous: referencing 
an argument that other great minds have proven to be valid is not a sign of 
being intellectually weak. The irony is that your unwarranted accusations, 
that the criminals in this story are Democrats and atheists, is a hate 
tactic utilized by countless other zealots. At least the argument he is 
referencing is legitimate. You're just spewing ignorance.
comments.author: Sweederland Johnson

comments.text:
So I can't say something I've heard? I guess you won't be quoting the bible 
any time soon.
And it's interesting that you can hear something true so many times and 
choose to still ignore it. I'm not saying that makes you daft or anything 
just an observation as to what growing up religious does to someone.
comments.author: Trevor Colby

comments.text:

original thoughts!

comments.author: Rustedblade

comments.text:
Someone is really trying to lay blame! Atheists aren't responsible for 
anything other atheists do (assuming your baseless assumption that the 
offenders are atheist is even correct) because we aren't a group. All being 
Atheist means is that you DON'T believe in a God. For example, even you 
don't believe in many Gods, such as Thor, Ra, Apollo, Shiva, Cao Dai, 
Vishnu, Tenri-O-no-Mikoto, Waheguru. So with respect to all of those gods 
you are as atheist as I am, and proud of it no doubt, therefor it would be 
useless to group atheists together as everyone is atheist to most Gods.
comments.author: Trevor Colby

comments.author: Sweederland Johnson

comments.text:
+soldier4prophesy "If hell was invented 100s of years after Jesus, how is 
it that Jesus Himself tells a story of a rich man in "hell"?" through 
hundreds of years of interpretation, corrections, and mistakes which were 
meant to be corrections. This isn't a hard concept... Near death 
experiences prove nothing, they only prove that our concept of an 
"afterlife" involves pearly gates with clouds etc. Why do you think they 
all have the same features, yet none of them have any other information 
that could validate it outside taking their word for it. These NDE's have 
been debunked for years and sorry to say just wishing something to be true 
doesn't actually make it true. I was a Christian before I researched/read 
the bible to prove the accusations against Christianity were wrong. Yet I 
came out an Atheist. Your logic can be summed up to that of a false 
dichotomy. Oh and BTW NDE's don't equal god or afterlife's lmfao it proves 
they almost died but didn't... I had the flu really bad when I was little 
and I saw vivid dinosaurs in the street on my way back from the doctor does 
this therefore mean dinosaurs were really on the street? No it means I had 
a hullicantion which is typical for the condition I was in. I hope I go to 
hell because that's where all the gambling, porn, and whores are going to 
be. I mean for fuck sake I'm one of Satan's boys, Fuck God. The unjust, 
genocidal, psychopathic, criminal. Not worthy of worship and sure as hell 
not even close to meeting the burden of proof the biblical god implies. 
Criss cross apple sauce, Amen! I'll pray really hard for you bro.. Satan 
loves all, rejoice in his image.
comments.author: Zthestory

comments.text:
+Sweederland Johnson I can already tell you've done little or no 
research. How do you hallucinate "real events"? I was atheist till I 
researched NDEs with the intent to prove they were fake. So about all I can 
to you is, "sorry bro... they're real" and "I hope yours is good 
one"....peace
comments.author: soldier4prophesy

comments.text:
Hell is fake. Sorry, bro. These people either hallucinated or made 
deliberate fabrications to further their own religious agenda.
comments.author: Sweederland Johnson

comments.text:
+Sweederland Johnson "Hell was invented hundreds of...."
And so was that story of hell being "invented". If hell was invented 100s 
of years after Jesus, how is it that Jesus Himself tells a story of a rich 
man in "hell"? People make these claims all the time after having done NO 
research.
Do some research on near death experiences. And I'm not talking about some 
wild tales invented by some old ladies with nothing better to do, I'm 
talking about people who were able to describe everything that was going on 
around them while their bodies were dead on an operating table.
They also described hell in vivid detail and said it was not anything 
they'd wish on their worst enemy. I've spent years researching NDEs and I 
believe they're a 100% real.
comments.author: soldier4prophesy

comments.text:
+soldier4prophesy Hell was invented hundreds of years after Jesus allegedly 
walked the Earth. It's a fictional device that's used to control others. 
Testimony of what others supposedly see when they are dead can never really 
be "credible." You're in a state of catastrophic trauma while your brain is 
experiencing oxygen deprivation. Until there is a way to reproduce 
meaningful tests, hell should be attributed to nothing more than scare 
tactics and hallucinations.
comments.author: Sweederland Johnson

comments.text:
+ghuegel "people invented the idea of hell"

Let's hope you don't find out the hard way, how wrong you are. Do some 
research on near death experiences and only consider the ones who gave 
credible information as to what was happening while they were dead.
comments.author: soldier4prophesy

comments.text:

comments.author: Cream147player

comments.text:
Gotta say it this is not the norm at all. I worked with that population 
since1999 and there is a massive amount of regulation, rightfully so to 
prevent these type of things from happening. I would say that most places 
you work with these kids because you wanna make a difference. Most of the 
people I had the pleasure of working with did anyway. This place was the 
house of horrors like you said and I would never defend anybody or place 
that harmed kids period. I just would like to state not every place was 
like this as Anna mentioned I wish all residential facilities had people 
who cared, unfortunately this is not the case. Regulations help, but if 
thisany kids came up missing there had to be someone much higher who easy 
covering things up, because there should have been reports and follow up 
from a state level that apparently did not happen. Wetter this was a 
non-profit, for-profit or state facility this place should have been shut 
down years ago. Keep up the good work because most ppl just don't realize 
how valuable our kids truly are and when stories like this happen then we 
all should take ot as a wake up call.﻿
